data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Josh Windass is on target to give Sheffield Wed a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 15, Cauley Woodrow levels the score at 1-1.
Barry Bannan (Sheffield Wed) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Dominik Frieser puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Hillsborough Stadium.
Joey Pelupessy is replacing Joost van Aken for the home team.
In the minute 66, Liam Palmer is on a sub for Cheyenne Dunkley for Sheffield Wed.
The away team replace Matty James with Herbie Kane.
Victor Adeboyejo is replacing Dominik Frieser for Barnsley at Hillsborough Stadium.
In the minute 67, Valerien Ismael (Barnsley) is making a third substitution, with Luke Thomas replacing Conor Chaplin.
The home team have replaced Callum Paterson with Isaiah Brown. This is the third substitution made today by Tony Pulis.
Sheffield Wed make their fourth substitution with Jordan Rhodes replacing Dominic Iorfa.
In the minute 86, Valerien Ismael is making the team's fourth substitution at Hillsborough Stadium with George Miller replacing Cauley Woodrow.
The away team replace Alex Mowatt with Romal Palmer.
